texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: UPDATE:  I've found a better configuration via another X1 Carbon user and there's a  new post with all the details .
texts.text: UPDATE:  I've found a better configuration via another X1 Carbon user and there's a  new post with all the details .

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The Lenovo X1 Carbon comes with a pretty useful clickpad just below the keyboard, but the default synaptics settings in X from a Fedora 17 installation aren't the best for this particular laptop. I found some tips about managing clickpads in a  Github Gist about the Samsung Series 9  and I adjusted the values for the X1. To get my configuration, just create
texts.text: The Lenovo X1 Carbon comes with a pretty useful clickpad just below the keyboard, but the default synaptics settings in X from a Fedora 17 installation aren't the best for this particular laptop. I found some tips about managing clickpads in a  Github Gist about the Samsung Series 9  and I adjusted the values for the X1. To get my configuration, just create

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: and toss this data in there:
texts.text: and toss this data in there:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
Section "InputClass"
  Identifier "touchpad catchall"
  Driver "synaptics"
  MatchIsTouchpad "on"
  MatchDevicePath "/dev/input/event*"
  Option "TapButton1" "1"
  Option "TapButton2" "3"
  Option "TapButton3" "2"
  Option "VertTwoFingerScroll" "on"
  Option "HorizTwoFingerScroll" "on"
  Option "HorizHysteresis" "50"
  Option "VertHysteresis" "50"
  Option "PalmDetect"    "1"
  Option "PalmMinWidth"  "5"
  Option "PalmMinZ"      "40"
EndSection
texts.text:
Section "InputClass"
  Identifier "touchpad catchall"
  Driver "synaptics"
  MatchIsTouchpad "on"
  MatchDevicePath "/dev/input/event*"
  Option "TapButton1" "1"
  Option "TapButton2" "3"
  Option "TapButton3" "2"
  Option "VertTwoFingerScroll" "on"
  Option "HorizTwoFingerScroll" "on"
  Option "HorizHysteresis" "50"
  Option "VertHysteresis" "50"
  Option "PalmDetect"    "1"
  Option "PalmMinWidth"  "5"
  Option "PalmMinZ"      "40"
EndSection

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: There are a few important settings here to note:
texts.text: There are a few important settings here to note:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You will need to restart X (or reboot) to apply these settings from the configuration file. If you want to test the settings before restarting, you can apply individual adjustments with
